name: Blue Bunny
description:
Blue Bunny must collect all the coins and gems that he finds in the forest but he must avoid the dangers and not disturb the other animals.

This cute retro platform game for PC with 10 levels is ideal to relax for a while.

Suitable for children: does not contain violence.

S-control:

Walk to the right: "d" or "right"

Walk left: "to" or "left"

Jump: "space"

Go up: "up"

You can play  the demo free here: 

https://mariaparragames.itch.io/blue-bunny-game-demo

Credits:

Blue Bunny Assets: Free Game Assets

Scenarios and programming: MariaParraGames

Game asset: Forest Tileset 2 Pixel Art Game Asset
